orderShipmentPickup.title: Order shipment pickup
orderShipmentPickup.description: The complete order shipment and pickup details in the Order Management System

requestId.title: Request ID
requestId.description: Specify a unique ID for the order event

timestamp.title: Timestamp
timestamp.description: The date when the event happened in the Order Management System in ISO 8601 UTC format, YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS. If left blank, the value defaults to the date the event was received.

order.title: Order
order.description: The date when the event happened in the Order Management System in ISO 8601 UTC format, YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS. If left blank, the value defaults to the date the event was received.

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique order ID that is generated by the Order Management System. This ID is provided as a reference ID to an order.

online.title: Online
online.description: Indicates whether the mode of the order that is generated in the Order Management System is online

retailerEventType.title: Retailer event type
retailerEventType.description: The event used in the Order Management System

eventType.title: Event type
eventType.description: The event type used in the Order Management System

data.title: Data
data.description: A free form JSON object that contains all the data from the Order Management System, which represents the event. The data in the object is used to design and render the notification message templates.

notificationChannels.title: Notification channel
notificationChannels.description: Specifies the channel to be used to deliver notifications of the event

recipientName.title: Recipient name
recipientName.description: The name to address the recipient in the notification messages

channelType.title: Channel type
channelType.description: Select either SMS or email as the communication medium to send a notification

emailAddress.title: Email address
emailAddress.description: Specify the email address for the recipient to receive the notification based on the selected channel type

phoneNumber.title: Phone number
phoneNumber.description: Specify the phone number for the recipient to receive the notification based on the selected channel type

attachmentUrls.title: Attachment URLs
attachmentUrls.description: The attachment URLs for the recipient of the notification

provided.title: Provided
provided.description: The provided field for the recipient of the notification

items.title: Items
items.description: Specifies the items that are affected by the current event

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique order item ID that is generated by the Order Management System

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the item in the Order Management System

status.title: Status
status.description: The status of the item in the Order Management System

quantity.title: Quantity
quantity.description: The number of items in the order event. You must specify a minimum value of 1.

description.title: Description
description.description: A description of the item that is used for presentation purposes

customAttributes.title: Custom attributes
customAttributes.description: A dictionary of additional item attributes that are not captured in the standard item attributes

pickups.title: Pickups
pickups.description: A pickup is a fulfillment (full or partial) of an order where the items are picked up from a specific store

store.title: Store
store.description: The pickup store name and location of the order item

type1.title: Type
type1.description: Select whether the pickup is from in-store or at the curbside of the store location

pickupNumber.title: Pickup number
pickupNumber.description: The pickup number in the notification. This number helps to identify the pickup order item in the store.

items.title: Items
items.description: Specifies the items that are affected by the current event

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique order item ID that is generated by the Order Management System

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the item in the Order Management System

status.title: Status
status.description: The status of the item in the Order Management System

quantity.title: Quantity
quantity.description: The number of items in the order event. You must specify a minimum value of 1.

description.title: Description
description.description: A description of the item that is used for presentation purposes

customAttributes.title: Custom attributes
customAttributes.description: A dictionary of additional item attributes that are not captured in the standard item attributes

attributes.title: Attributes
attributes.description: A list of additional item attributes that are not captured in the standard pickup attributes. An order attribute uses a key-value pair to describe an aspect of an order in string format.

key.title: Key
key.description: Specify the key for the additional item attributes that are not captured in the standard pickup attributes. For example, 'Store Manager'.

value.title: Value
value.description: Specify the value of the key specified for the additional item attributes that are not captured in the standard pickup attributes. For example, 'John Smith'.

shipments.title: Shipments
shipments.description: A shipment is a fulfillment (full or partial) of an order where the items are delivered by a carrier with a tracking number that is used to track the state of the delivery

shipmentId.title: Shipment ID
shipmentId.description: A unique ID that identifies the shipment of the order. You cannot use the same shipment ID for multiple shipments for the same order.

trackingNumber.title: Tracking number
trackingNumber.description: The unique tracking number to track the state of the delivery. A tracking number is unique per-order.

items.title: Items
items.description: Specifies the items that are affected by the current event

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique order item ID that is generated by the Order Management System

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the item in the Order Management System

status.title: Status
status.description: The status of the item in the Order Management System

quantity.title: Quantity
quantity.description: The number of items in the order event. You must specify a minimum value of 1.

description.title: Description
description.description: A description of the item that is used for presentation purposes

customAttributes.title: Custom attributes
customAttributes.description: A dictionary of additional item attributes that are not captured in the standard item attributes

attributes.title: Attributes
attributes.description: A list of additional item attributes that are not captured in the standard pickup attributes. An order attribute uses a key-value pair to describe an aspect of an order in string format.

key.title: Key
key.description: Specify the key for the additional item attributes that are not captured in the standard pickup attributes. For example, 'Store Manager'.

value.title: Value
value.description: Specify the value of the key specified for the additional item attributes that are not captured in the standard pickup attributes. For example, 'John Smith'.

eventId.title: Event ID
eventId.description: The unique event ID of the order

orderTracking.title: Order tracking
orderTracking.description: A tracking event represents an event in the lifecycle of a shipment. A single shipment has multiple tracking events. A single tracking event can be associated only with a single shipment.

timestamp.title: Timestamp
timestamp.description: The date when the event happened in the Order Management System in ISO 8601 UTC format, YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS. If left blank, the value defaults to the date the event was received.

eventId.title: Event ID
eventId.description: The unique event ID of the order

orderId.title: Order ID
orderId.description: The unique order ID that is generated by the Order Management System. This ID is provided as a reference ID to an order.

brandId.title: Brand ID
brandId.description: The unique brand ID that is associated with the tracking event

eventType.title: Event type
eventType.description: Specifies the type of tracking event

carrier.title: Carrier
carrier.description: The carrier for the shipment that is associated with the tracking event

trackingNumber.title: Tracking number
trackingNumber.description: The shipment tracking number that is associated with the tracking event

status.title: Status
status.description: The status of the shipment at the time the tracking event occurred

statusDetail.title: Status detail
statusDetail.description: The additional status information of the shipment at the time the tracking event occurred

trackingLocation.title: Tracking location
trackingLocation.description: The location of the shipment at the time the tracking event occurred

estDeliveryDate.title: Estimated delivery date
estDeliveryDate.description: The estimated delivery date of the shipment at the time the tracking event occurred

carrierDate.title: Carrier date
carrierDate.description: The date when the tracking event occurred, which is provided by the carrier. The date can be in local time-zone depending on the carrier.

requestDate.title: Request date
requestDate.description: The date when the tracking event was processed by the Order Management System
